thread.title: Roger Federer unwittingly poses with female fan whose bare bum is on full display
thread.title_full: Roger Federer unwittingly poses with female fan whose bare bum is on full display

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Roger Federer unwittingly poses with female fan whose bare bum is on full display
text:
Roger Federer unwittingly poses with female fan whose bare bum is on full display The tennis ace was relaxing on Miami beach when he was asked for the snap Share Cheeky! The tennis star didn't appear to notice she was flashing her bum (Photo: Splash News) Share Get daily   
Roger Federer unwittingly posed with a female fan whose bare fum was on full display this week. 
The tennis star, 35, was relaxing on Miami beach when the blonde asked him for a snap. 
But unbeknown to a smiling Federer, she was cheekily flashing a lot of flesh as she grinned for the shot. 
The former world No 1 has was enjoying some downtime with his wife Mirka, twins sons and twin daughters in between competing in the Miami Open. Tennis star Roger Federer takes selfies with fans, including one scantily clad woman (Photo: Splash News) Tennis star Roger Federer takes selfies with fans, including one scantily clad woman (Photo: Splash News) 
While in Miami, he's hoping to win his second Masters 1000 in succession. 
Earlier this month, Federer defeated his Swiss compatriot Stan Wawrinka in straight sets to claim a record-equalling fifth BNP Paribas Indian Wells Open title. Tennis star Roger Federer takes selfies with fans, including one scantily clad woman (Photo: Splash News) Tennis star Roger Federer takes selfies with fans, including one scantily clad woman (Photo: Splash News) (Photo: Getty Images North America) 
The world No 6's career was in question last year after a knee injury saw him miss the second half of the season, but he produced a stunning comeback win in January when he claimed an 18th grand slam title with victory at the Australian Open. 
And he then followed that up in the desert, beating countryman Stan Wawrinka 6-4 7-5 in Sunday's final. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
